title: HOT JAMZ
content:
This has been here before and we couldn't identify it at that point either. They have resuscitated the project and want to use it some more. Who am I to tell them no? I just need to help them find where to license it. Ideas?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107190438im_/http:/typophile.com/files/screenshot_3462.jpeg)
author: Miss Tiffany

comments.content: I'm paging Mike with my mind. Mike, come to this thread!

Call them?  
KPRS-FM, Hot 103 Jamz can deliver your message to people with spending power....

For more information please call 816.763.2040.
Radio guys don't know much about type. That is why they asked me to identify it for them. ;)
